name: gambleglee-dev-tools
description: Development tools and scripts for GambleGlee

scripts.format:backend: cd backend && python -m black app/ && python -m isort app/
scripts.format:all: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.check:backend: cd backend && python -m black --check app/ && python -m isort --check-only app/ && python -m flake8 app/ --count --select=E9,F63,F7,F82 --show-source --statistics
scripts.check:all: npm run check:backend && npm run check:frontend
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: GambleGlee Team
